mapper.insert: insert into warehousing_record( warehousing_record_code, item_code, storage_code, warehousing_type, wr_date, amount, warehousing_type_code, keeping_date ) values ( seq_warehousing_record_code.nextval, #{item_code}, #{storage_code}, #{warehousing_type}, sysdate, #{amount}, #{warehousing_type_code}, sysdate+30 )
mapper.update: update warehousing_record set warehousing_record_code=#{warehousing_record_code}, item_code=#{item_code}, storage_code=#{storage_code}, warehousing_type=#{warehousing_type}, wr_date=#{wr_date}, amount=#{amount}, warehousing_type_code=#{warehousing_type_code}, keeping_date=#{keeping_date} where warehousing_record_code=#{warehousing_record_code}
mapper.select: SELECT ALLY.ITEM_CODE, ALLY.NAME, SUM(CASE WHEN ALLY.WAREHOUSING_TYPE ='입고' THEN ALLY.AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN ALLY.WAREHOUSING_TYPE = '출고' THEN ALLY.AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS amount FROM ( SELECT wh.item_code, wh.amount, ALL_ITEM.NAME, WH.WAREHOUSING_TYPE FROM WAREHOUSING_RECORD WH JOIN (SELECT i.item_code,r.name FROM ITEM I JOIN raw_materials R ON i.item_code = r.item_code UNION SELECT I.ITEM_CODE, P.NAME FROM ITEM I JOIN PRODUCT P ON I.ITEM_CODE = P.ITEM_CODE ) ALL_ITEM ON WH.ITEM_CODE = ALL_ITEM.ITEM_CODE ) ALLY GROUP BY ALLY.ITEM_CODE, ALLY.NAME
